import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent implements OnInit { recipes: Recipe[] = [ new Recipe('A Test Recipe', 'This is simply a test', 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/15/Recipe_logo.jpeg'), new Recipe('A Test Recipe', 'This is simply a test', 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/15/Recipe_logo.jpeg') ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }

{{ recipe.name }}

{{ recipe.description }}
